txt.en: 'This force is too strong, abandon your posts and scatter to the wild!'
'Take heart and hope, keep your wits and we shall drive them back! Fight now with renewed strength!'
'Hold your ground near the battlements. We will fight these dogs on our terms!'
'Rally the woods to our defence, our foothold slips, we must redouble our efforts!'
'The ground will be wet with your blood!'
'Back to the shadows with these agents of darkness! I shall defend this wood with my life!'
